Class: Bus

Bus

new Bus(opt)

core/bus.js, line 32

Create a Bus instance. Notice the 'events' object will be like this: { "{namespace}" : { "listeners" : [{ "name" : "{function name or alias}", "module" : "{module name}" }], "children" : { "str" : { "{child namespace}" : { "name" : "{module name}.{function name or alias}", } }, "reg" : { "{regular expression}":{ "name" : "{module name}.{function name or alias}", } } } } }

static data in Bus start with "_", runtime data start with "$$"

Name Type Description
opt object

options

Members

reset runtime data

Returns:
object or array of results returned by listeners

on(eventOrg, listener, opt)

core/bus.js, line 205

Attach a event to the Bus

Name Type Description
eventOrg string

original event name with namespace. "" match root.
listener mix

listener can be both function or array
opt mix

for mute and other options
